Name: arteritic anterior ischemic optic neuropathy
Definition: An anterior ischemic optic neuropathy that is characterized by near-complete vision loss caused by damage to the medium-sized blood vessels supplying the optic nerves following temporal arteritis.

Name: non-arteritic anterior ischemic optic neuropathy
Definition: An anterior ischemic optic neuropathy that is characterized by near-complete vision loss caused by acute ischemic damage to the optic nerve due to non-inflammatory small vessel disease.
